subject: Hockey, Ice
Poisoning and Poisons
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Nearly two dozen members of a Massachusetts team were held overnight for observation at a hospital after a suspected case of nitrogen dioxide poisoning at a rink in North Smithfield, R.I.
snippet: Nearly two dozen members of a Massachusetts team were held overnight for observation at a hospital after a suspected case of nitrogen dioxide poisoning at a rink in North Smithfield, R.I.
